Hero.text: I am a Full Stack developer with over a year of professional experience and interested in challenging and innovative projects. Always looking to learn something new, bringing creative, scalable and efficient solutions.

About.title: About me
About.description1: My journey in the technology area began in 2021, when I started taking courses and developing projects to improve my learning. In August 2022, I started my degree in Information Systems at Centro Universitário Católica do Leste de Minas Gerais (UNILESTE) and, since then, I have constantly sought to learn and deepen my knowledge in the area.
About.description2: I am currently a Full Stack Developer, and despite working in all layers of web development, I have a strong inclination towards Front-End development, always aiming to maintain a high standard of code quality.
About.description3: Additionally, I have experience in Backend, Data Analysis and Administrative Activities, areas in which I have worked for more than two years. I am always looking for new challenges and opportunities to learn and grow as a professional.

Projects.title: My Projects
